content:
DbParameterCollection Class

In this Article

The base class for a collection of parameters relevant to a DbCommand.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class DbParameterCollection : MarshalByRefObject, System.Collections.IList, System.Data.IDataParameterCollection

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.MarshalByRefObject
  • DbParameterCollection

Inherited Members

,

,

Constructors summary

DbParameterCollection()

Initializes a new instance of the DbParameterCollection class.

Properties summary

Count

Specifies the number of items in the collection.
IsFixedSize

Specifies whether the collection is a fixed size.
IsReadOnly

Specifies whether the collection is read-only.
IsSynchronized

Specifies whether the collection is synchronized.
Item(Int32)

Gets and sets the DbParameter at the specified index.
Item(String)

Gets and sets the DbParameter with the specified name.
SyncRoot

Specifies the Object to be used to synchronize access to the collection.

Methods summary

Add(Object)

Adds the specified DbParameter object to the DbParameterCollection.
AddRange(Array)

Adds an array of items with the specified values to the DbParameterCollection.
Clear()

Removes all DbParameter values from the DbParameterCollection.
Contains(Object)

Indicates whether a DbParameter with the specified stem.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value* is contained in the collection.
Contains(String)

Indicates whether a DbParameter with the specified name exists in the collection.
CopyTo(Array,Int32)

Copies an array of items to the collection starting at the specified index.
GetEnumerator()

Exposes the stem.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator* method, which supports a simple iteration over a collection by a .NET Framework data provider.
GetParameter(Int32)

Returns the DbParameter object at the specified index in the collection.
GetParameter(String)

Returns DbParameter the object with the specified name.
IndexOf(Object)

Returns the index of the specified DbParameter object.
IndexOf(String)

Returns the index of the DbParameter object with the specified name.
Insert(Int32,Object)

Inserts the specified index of the DbParameter object with the specified name into the collection at the specified index.
Remove(Object)

Removes the specified DbParameter object from the collection.
RemoveAt(Int32)

Removes the DbParameter object at the specified from the collection.
RemoveAt(String)

Removes the DbParameter object with the specified name from the collection.
SetParameter(Int32,DbParameter)

Sets the DbParameter object at the specified index to a new value.
SetParameter(String,DbParameter)

Sets the DbParameter object with the specified name to a new value.

Explicit Interface Implementations summary

IList.Item(Int32)

Gets or sets the element at the specified index.
IDataParameterCollection.Item(String)

Gets or sets the parameter at the specified index.

Constructors

  • DbParameterCollection()

    Initializes a new instance of the DbParameterCollection class.

    protected DbParameterCollection ();

Properties

  • Count

    Specifies the number of items in the collection.

    public abstract int Count { get; }

    Property Value

    • Int32

      The number of items in the collection.

  • IsFixedSize

    Specifies whether the collection is a fixed size.

    public virtual bool IsFixedSize { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the collection is a fixed size; otherwise false.

  • IsReadOnly

    Specifies whether the collection is read-only.

    public virtual bool IsReadOnly { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the collection is read-only; otherwise false.

  • IsSynchronized

    Specifies whether the collection is synchronized.

    public virtual bool IsSynchronized { get; }

    Property Value

    • Boolean

      true if the collection is synchronized; otherwise false.

  • Item(Int32)

    Gets and sets the DbParameter at the specified index.

    public System.Data.Common.DbParameter this[int index] { get; set; }

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The zero-based index of the parameter.

    Property Value

    • DbParameter

      The DbParameter at the specified index.

    Exceptions

    • IndexOutOfRangeException

      The specified index does not exist.

  • Item(String)

    Gets and sets the DbParameter with the specified name.

    public System.Data.Common.DbParameter this[string parameterName] { get; set; }

    Parameters

    • parameterName
      String

      The name of the parameter.

    Property Value

    • DbParameter

      The DbParameter with the specified name.

    Exceptions

    • IndexOutOfRangeException

      The specified index does not exist.

  • SyncRoot

    Specifies the Object to be used to synchronize access to the collection.

    public abstract object SyncRoot { get; }

    Property Value

    • Object

      A Object to be used to synchronize access to the DbParameterCollection.

Methods

  • Add(Object)

    Adds the specified DbParameter object to the DbParameterCollection.

    public abstract int Add (object value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Object

      The stem.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value* of the DbParameter to add to the collection.

    Returns

    • Int32

      The index of the DbParameter object in the collection.

  • AddRange(Array)

    Adds an array of items with the specified values to the DbParameterCollection.

    public abstract void AddRange (Array values);

    Parameters

    • values
      Array

      An array of values of type DbParameter to add to the collection.

  • Clear()

    Removes all DbParameter values from the DbParameterCollection.

    public abstract void Clear ();
  • Contains(Object)

    Indicates whether a DbParameter with the specified stem.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value* is contained in the collection.

    public abstract bool Contains (object value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Object

      The stem.Data.Common.DbParameter.Value* of the DbParameter to look for in the collection.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the DbParameter is in the collection; otherwise false.

  • Contains(String)

    Indicates whether a DbParameter with the specified name exists in the collection.

    public abstract bool Contains (string value);

    Parameters

    • value
      String

      The name of the DbParameter to look for in the collection.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the DbParameter is in the collection; otherwise false.

  • CopyTo(Array,Int32)

    Copies an array of items to the collection starting at the specified index.

    public abstract void CopyTo (Array array, int index);

    Parameters

    • array
      Array

      The array of items to copy to the collection.

    • index
      Int32

      The index in the collection to copy the items.

  • GetEnumerator()

    Exposes the stem.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator* method, which supports a simple iteration over a collection by a .NET Framework data provider.

    public abstract System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator ();

    Returns

    • IEnumerator

      An IEnumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.

  • GetParameter(Int32)

    Returns the DbParameter object at the specified index in the collection.

    protected abstract System.Data.Common.DbParameter GetParameter (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The index of the DbParameter in the collection.

    Returns

    • DbParameter

      The DbParameter object at the specified index in the collection.

  • GetParameter(String)

    Returns DbParameter the object with the specified name.

    protected abstract System.Data.Common.DbParameter GetParameter (string parameterName);

    Parameters

    • parameterName
      String

      The name of the DbParameter in the collection.

    Returns

    • DbParameter

      The DbParameter the object with the specified name.

  • IndexOf(Object)

    Returns the index of the specified DbParameter object.

    public abstract int IndexOf (object value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Object

      The DbParameter object in the collection.

    Returns

    • Int32

      The index of the specified DbParameter object.

  • IndexOf(String)

    Returns the index of the DbParameter object with the specified name.

    public abstract int IndexOf (string parameterName);

    Parameters

    • parameterName
      String

      The name of the DbParameter object in the collection.

    Returns

    • Int32

      The index of the DbParameter object with the specified name.

  • Insert(Int32,Object)

    Inserts the specified index of the DbParameter object with the specified name into the collection at the specified index.

    public abstract void Insert (int index, object value);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The index at which to insert the DbParameter object.

    • value
      Object

      The DbParameter object to insert into the collection.

  • Remove(Object)

    Removes the specified DbParameter object from the collection.

    public abstract void Remove (object value);

    Parameters

    • value
      Object

      The DbParameter object to remove.

  • RemoveAt(Int32)

    Removes the DbParameter object at the specified from the collection.

    public abstract void RemoveAt (int index);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The index where the DbParameter object is located.

  • RemoveAt(String)

    Removes the DbParameter object with the specified name from the collection.

    public abstract void RemoveAt (string parameterName);

    Parameters

    • parameterName
      String

      The name of the DbParameter object to remove.

  • SetParameter(Int32,DbParameter)

    Sets the DbParameter object at the specified index to a new value.

    protected abstract void SetParameter (int index, System.Data.Common.DbParameter value);

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The index where the DbParameter object is located.

    • value
      DbParameter

      The new DbParameter value.

  • SetParameter(String,DbParameter)

    Sets the DbParameter object with the specified name to a new value.

    protected abstract void SetParameter (string parameterName, System.Data.Common.DbParameter value);

    Parameters

    • parameterName
      String

      The name of the DbParameter object in the collection.

    • value
      DbParameter

      The new DbParameter value.

Explicit Interface Implementations

  • IList.Item(Int32)

    Gets or sets the element at the specified index.

    object System.Collections.IList.Item[int index] { get; set; }

    Parameters

    • index
      Int32

      The zero-based index of the element to get or set.

    Returns

    • Object

      The element at the specified index.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DbParameterCollection instance is cast to an IList interface.

    For more information, see Item.

  • IDataParameterCollection.Item(String)

    Gets or sets the parameter at the specified index.

    object System.Data.IDataParameterCollection.Item[string parameterName] { get; set; }

    Parameters

    • parameterName
      String

      The name of the parameter to retrieve.

    Returns

    • Object

      An Object at the specified index.

    Remarks

    This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the DbParameterCollection instance is cast to an IDataParameterCollection interface.

    For more information, see Item.
